0.title: Welcome to Azure Workshops
0.content: This collection of self-paced labs and workshops is designed to guide you through common Azure services and development scenarios. Each module provides step-by-step instructions, code snippets, and verification checks. We recommend starting with Module 1 to ensure your local development environment is set up correctly.
